Text:
Hi and thanx for your uploads!
I'm posting here since chances are you'll see this sooner, being your latter upload. 
I'm having troubles playing Science is Fiction that you have uploaded http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8418871/Science_is_Fictione___23_Films_by_Jean_Painlev_amp_eacute_
I can't play the disks in either VLC or Power DVD. Can you please tell me if you are experiencing similar issues?
Thanx, ZGNN, and keep up the great work!
